Darrell Long.content: Give a bullet point biography of Darrell Long highlighting their contributions and achievements as a computer scientist, with each fact separated with a new line character.

Here's a bullet point biography of Darrell Long:

* Darrell Long is a renowned computer scientist with significant contributions to the field of computer science and engineering.
* He is a Professor Emeritus of Computer Science at the University of California, Santa Cruz.
* Long's research focuses on various areas, including computer architecture, computer networks, and high-performance computing.
* He has made notable contributions to the development of computer architecture, including the design of high-performance computing systems.
* Long has also made significant contributions to the field of computer networks, including the development of novel network protocols and architectures.
* He has published numerous papers and articles on his research in top-tier conferences and journals, including the ACM Transactions on Computer Systems and the IEEE Transactions on Computers.
* Long has supervised numerous Ph.D. students and postdoctoral researchers, many of whom have gone on to become leading researchers in their own right.
* He has received numerous awards and honors for his contributions to computer science, including the ACM SIGARCH Outstanding Contribution to Computer Architecture Award.
* Long is a fellow of the Association for Computing Machinery (ACM) and the Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers (IEEE).
* Throughout his career, Long has been recognized for his commitment to mentoring and teaching, and has received several awards for his contributions to education. 
* He has also served on various committees and panels, including the National Science Foundation's Computer and Information Science and Engineering (CISE) Advisory Committee. 
* Long's work has had a significant impact on the development of high-performance computing systems and computer networks, and has paved the way for new advances in these areas.  He continues to be a respected figure in the computer science community.  He is a true pioneer in his field.  His legacy will continue to inspire future generations of computer scientists. 
* Long's contributions to computer science and engineering have been recognized by his peers and the broader academic community, and he remains a prominent figure in the field to this day. 
* He has also been recognized for his contributions to the development of the field of computer science and engineering education.  He has received several awards for his work in this area, including the ACM SIGCSE Award for Outstanding Contribution to Computer Science Education. 
* Long's impact on the field of computer science and engineering extends beyond his research and teaching, as he has also been a vocal advocate for the importance of diversity and inclusion in the field.  He has worked to promote the participation of underrepresented groups in computer science and engineering, and has been a strong supporter of initiatives aimed at increasing diversity and inclusion in the field. 
* Throughout his career, Long has been committed to giving back to his community and has been involved in various outreach and service activities.  He has worked with local schools and organizations to promote interest in computer science and engineering among underrepresented groups, and has also been involved in various volunteer activities.
